document_data.mainbody:
ist Corlos was a member of the Flaming Fist mercenary company from the Lower City of Baldurs Gate in the late 15 century DR.
Corlos was a gold dwarf woman with a clean-shaven face. She had dark skin and dark brown eyes. She wore a set of chainmail armor as a part of her Flaming Fist uniform decorated with a tabard that bore the companys banner, and was armed with a halberd.
In the , Fist Corlos was stationed within the barracks of the Heapside district of Baldurs Gate, where she, a steel watcher, and several other Flaming Fists guarded a small dungeon prison.
